column4: Microsoft to buy LinkedIn for $26.2 bln in its largest deal
column5: Microsoft Corp will buy LinkedIn Corp  for $26.2 billion in its biggest-ever deal  a bold stroke by Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella in his efforts to make the venerable software company a major force in next-generation computing.

column4: Microsoft unveils new Xbox console at E3
column5: June 13 Microsoft Corp launched a new version of its Xbox One console at the video game conference E3 in Los Angeles on Monday  bringing newer features such as support for 4K videos and high dynamic range imagery.

column4: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St ends lower for 3rd straight session
column5: NEW YORK  June 13 Wall Street ended lower for a third straight session on Monday as tech stalwarts Microsoft and Apple dragged on indexes and investors braced for major economic and political events in the United States and Europe.

column4: UPDATE 1-Moody's reviews Microsoft credit rating for cut after LinkedIn deal
column5: June 13 Rating agency Moody's placed Microsoft Corp's 'AAA' credit rating under review for downgrade following the software giant's deal to buy LinkedIn Corp  for $26.2 billion  citing concerns that it would be funded through new debt.

column4: UPDATE 3-Hail a ride hands-free: Apple opens Siri to outside developers
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  June 13 Apple Inc is opening its popular Siri digital assistant to outside developers  which means iPhone users could soon be able to hail rides with Uber  publish photos on Shutterfly or make a call on Skype with voice commands.

column4: BRIEF-S&P says Microsoft 'AAA/A-1+' ratings affirmed on its plan to acquire LinkedIn  outlook stable
column5: * Microsoft 'aaa/a-1+' ratings affirmed on its plan to acquire linkedin for $26.2 billion; outlook stable

column4: Moody's reviews Microsoft credit rating for cut after LinkedIn deal
column5: June 13 Rating agency Moody's placed software giant Microsoft Corp's AAA credit rating under review for downgrade following the software giant's deal to buy LinkedIn Corp for $26.2 billion.

column4: BRIEF-Moody's reviews Microsoft's AAA rating for downgrade
column5: * Moody's reviews Microsoft's AAA rating for downgrade following announced acquisition of LinkedIn

column4: US STOCKS-Wall St down for third-straight day as Microsoft drags
column5: * Indexes down: Dow 0.3 pct  S&P 0.36 pct  Nasdaq 0.61 pct   (Updates to early afternoon)

column4: BRIEF-Microsoft CEO On CNBC - Started LinkedIn deal talks in earnest from February 2016
column5: * Microsoft CEO On CNBC - Started deal talks in earnest from February 2016
